function ERI_EP05_18()
    --.結-3【3月第1週】「姫選挙・裏-凡人ｖｓ女帝-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙・裏-凡人ｖｓ女帝-"

    --//BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Hermes' song that had been echoing inside the auditorium fades out. ]])

    MSG([[ It seems that Hermes' appeal time has ended. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, Minato's real-time crossdressing reveal time is about to begin. ]])

    MSG([[ To be honest, whether it will be accepted or not is a gamble, but I have a feeling it will go well. ]])

    MSG([[ Setting aside the guests from outside the school, the students have witnessed Minato becoming cuter. ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing that background story from longtime rivals like Lira and Uran should evoke some kind of feeling. ]])

    MSG([[ I think it's a rather mean strategy on my part, but it's definitely more effective than just awkwardly showing off cuteness. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01fa")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0855.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】苦笑・汗 "Honestly, I really do have a bad personality, don’t I?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I've also begged fans to cast organized votes for the Princess Election's online poll. ]])

    MSG([[ I've always selfishly used whatever I could for my own sake. I'm completely different from the kind and gentle Minato who always puts others first. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01fa")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0856.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】苦笑・汗 "Well, that’s why I can understand strategies only someone with a bad personality would come up with." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0040.wav")
    MSG([[ 【????】 "Oh? For example?" ]])
    -- //ネメシア

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0857.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Like crashing the venue midway through the appeal and causing chaos." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just as expected, she came. ]])

    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Nemesia Himegami. Our archenemy. In her hand, clearly, is a suspicious ball. ]])

    MSG([[ I was right to wait by the entrance thinking she wouldn’t show herself for a while. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0041.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】通常 "How did you know I’d come with a surprise attack? There are other strategies like setting traps, you know?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0858.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Of course I thoroughly investigated for any traps. There are two reasons I thought you would do a surprise attack." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0859.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "First, there’s suspiciously almost no traps set. This is likely a psychological tactic to lull us into complacency." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0860.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "But more than anything, I guessed you’d surprise attack because of your personality. You’re the type who won’t be satisfied unless you eliminate annoying opponents yourself, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0861.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Last year’s end, you yourself exposed Minato’s crossdressing without help from your daughters or subordinates; that made it clear enough." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0042.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "Oh, you got it right~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> You really understand my personality well~ <sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0862.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "Yeah, reluctantly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A surprise attack after making us believe there was no enemy. I understood that psychology well because it’s a strategy I often use in online games. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t want to admit it, but Nemesia seems to share some traits with me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01fa")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0863.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】苦笑・汗 "By the way, is that hand holding a colored ball? Are you planning to throw it at Minato amid the confusion?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ka")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0864.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】ニヤリ "Using such a sneaky tactic after all, huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0043.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】通常 "It’s not that lame, you know?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0044.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "Inside this, instead of ink, there’s a whole lot of pig guts and blood <sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0045.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "Do you think a poor girl doused with that can stay calm? And would she still get votes, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0865.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り "...That’s even sleazier than I imagined. I’m really grossed out." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m really glad I was keeping watch. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much Minato has grown mentally, being hit with that would make it impossible to stay calm. ]])

    MSG([[ More than anything, I absolutely won’t forgive whoever hurts someone important to me with such ugly malice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0046.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "I’ll praise you for reading my mind, but what can you do alone? You should bring some friends, shouldn’t you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01aa")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0866.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】通常 "Inside the venue, I'm the only one without voting rights as the real "Erika Ikusa." Handling it alone is best." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ka")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0867.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】ニヤリ "Besides, like I said before, I have over 100,000 fans online." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0868.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】ニヤリ "Even you wouldn’t get rough with that, right? I suggest you back down quietly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0047.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】通常 "Oh dear, that’s troubling indeed. What shall we do?" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia laughs and approaches me. I wondered what she was plotting, but then— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0048.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Just kidding... Don't get cocky, brat." ]])

    --//SE：蹴りの音
    PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 20 , 20 , 300)
WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0869.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り "Ugh...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The next moment, she kicked me hard in the stomach. ]])

    MSG([[ My mind was on the verge of panic at the unexpected turn. Still, I hurriedly pulled out my phone and started preparing to stream. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0870.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "It seems I've snapped... Fine. You’ll be exposed on my channel." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0871.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り "W-What? No way...!? My channel... is gone...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0049.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "Oh my~? That’s bad~ But your game stream videos were probably in a gray area rights-wise, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0050.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "If ‘someone’ reported to management and your account was suspended, you can’t complain, can you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0872.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り "No way, you did that...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Honestly, I hadn’t thought she’d go that far. This villain before me seems determined to crush even a small fry like me with full force. ]])

    MSG([[ Frankly, her malice and the scale of her wrongdoing surpass me in every way. Alone, I can’t compete. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0051.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Now move aside, little girl. I don’t have the time to waste on brats like you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0873.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "I-I won’t let you through, absolutely not." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0052.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Persistent!!!!!!" ]])

    PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
    EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 20 , 20 , 300)
WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0874.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "Ugh...!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ This time she punched me hard in the throat. I couldn’t breathe and bent over, barely holding myself up from collapsing. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s painful. It hurts. Tears flow. It’s been since being bullied that I was hit by someone, but the pain hasn’t changed since then. ]])

    MSG([[ Even so―― ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0875.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "I will, not, let, you... through! Absolutely not!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Still, I won’t step aside from in front of Nemesia. I’m not going to move aside. ]])

PLAY_SE("SEc024.wav")

    MSG([[ Nemesia’s expression twisted with even more anger as she grabbed my collar. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0053.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Tch…! If you obstruct me any further, I’ll seriously break your bones! Just fall already!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0054.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "No matter how much a weakling like you tries, nothing will change!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0055.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Even that boy, Minato, is the same! There’s no way he can defeat the perfect beauty ‘Hermes’ I created!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0056.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Why don’t you understand!? No matter how much a failure tries, they’re still a failure! Get it through your head!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0876.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Fnuu!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0057.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Gu...!? She’s targeting the joints!" ]])

    MSG([[ I twisted Nemesia’s wrist lightly and escaped her grasp. ]])

    MSG([[ The self-defense technique I learned from Minato was unexpectedly useful here. Life really is unpredictable. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
---SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0877.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "I don’t need you to tell me. I know I’m a failure." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Facing someone who relentlessly pursues my complex might be fate. ]])

    MSG([[ If it’s retribution for being a failure until now, I deserve the blame. ]])

    MSG([[ But―― ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「諦めたい」→「諦めたり」（2020/02/03 02:42）
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0878.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "But I’ve decided not to belittle myself anymore. Being a failure won’t stop me from trying." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0879.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Because even someone like me, a failure who’s not a beauty... is loved by Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Unlike Marika who persevered but couldn’t handle no one understanding her, I’m the opposite. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t always try hard, but thanks to even a single supporter, I can endure. ]])

    MSG([[ For Minato, I can tolerate some pain, suffering, and hardship. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0880.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Just being loved by Minato is enough." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0881.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】真剣 "Even if I can’t become my ideal self, being special to someone makes me happy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0058.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Shallow, shallow, shallow! Far too shallow, ordinary person!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0059.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】真剣 "Such a pathetic, tiny wish typical of an average person! I, with my lofty ideals, will trample it all to pieces!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia’s demonic-colored nails lunged at me. ]])

    MSG([[ This might be where my efforts end. I bought some time, so Minato’s appeal must have succeeded. ]])

    MSG([[ If I can save Minato and Marika, breaking a bone or two doesn’t scare me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0882.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "………………" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0883.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り (No, that’s a lie! I’m still scared! Really scared!) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0884.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り (I want to run but my legs are shaking, and it’s no time to try persuading her—why did I try so hard?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After all, I’m a failure. So in the end, I rely on someone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0885.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "Help!! Minatooooooo!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My beloved cousin who always rushes to me when I’m troubled or crying. ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia sneered at my pathetic cries. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0060.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "You’re so stupid~ There’s no way he would come to help." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0061.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】嘲笑 "He’s in the middle of his appeal right now, you know." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0062.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】焦り "Eh――" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500, true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0931.wav")
    MSG([[ 【????】 "Akiraaaaaaa!!!" ]])
    --//SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Footsteps came from behind. I knew who was coming without looking. So I thanked him without turning around. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ha")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0886.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】赤面 "I knew you’d come, Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：エリカ（真剣）、ネメシア（焦り）
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ga")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_ERI01ba")
    --LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,900,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0063.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】焦り "M-Minato Ikusa!? Why are you here――" ]])
    --//BU：エリカ（真剣）、ネメシア（焦り）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ba")
    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ga")
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,300,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(500)
    --//effect：エリカがネメシアの背後をとるように
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,800,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(400)
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"BU_ERI01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(45,550,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(45,350,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


    MSG([[ Without answering Nemesia's question, Minato instantly got behind her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(45,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG011ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1318.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】真剣 "Don’t hurt my precious person!!!" ]])

    --//SE：身を翻す音（ｼｭﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)
--WAIT(300)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0064.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Nemesia】焦り "Gyaaahhhh!?" ]])
    --//BU：エリカ（真剣）


    --//SE：茂みに飛び込む音（ｶﾞｻｻｧ）
PLAY_SE("SEb037.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG011aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",500,false)

EFFECT_SCREEN(1 ,50,50,500,false,false)

--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",0,false)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-1920,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(500)
--LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ Nemesia’s body was blasted back like autumn leaves and slammed face-first into a nearby bush. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1319.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】真剣 "If you’d fought head on, you probably would have won." ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「私を戦わせて」→「ボクを戦わせて」（2020/02/03 02:51）
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1320.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】真剣 "Thanks to Daria-san letting me fight, I read your movements... thank you for making me stronger." ]])

    MSG([[ Minato snapped to attention and bowed crisply. ]])

    MSG([[ The resolution was so abrupt that I was left dumbfounded. ]])

    MSG([[ For Nemesia, who looked like a demon to me, to be dealt with so easily—that’s just how amazing Minato is. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1321.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】悲しみ "A-Akira, are you okay? There’s a bruise on your neck, but did she hurt you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0887.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "S-She did a bit, but I’m fine. No bleeding, and she didn’t hit noticeable spots like my face or eyes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1322.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】真剣 "That’s not fine at all! If marks remain, it’d be terrible! We have to get a compress in the infirmary right away!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0888.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "Geez… you act like getting cut by a knife is nothing..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ She worries about me again. She’s truly kindhearted and gentle and has captured my heart so deeply. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought maybe no matter what happens, I won’t ever like someone else. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0889.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】悲しみ "Though I called for help... why did you come? You shouldn’t have been able to hear me from inside the venue, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1323.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】苦笑 "I thought I heard your voice. Knowing you, I figured you might be lying in wait for an enemy somewhere, so I rushed out." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0890.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】焦り "Eh!? During the appeal?!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1324.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】通常 "Yes, but." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
